title: Accidental Crafting Mistake
body: I bought a mystery champion shard to complete my three champion shards that can form into another champion. I received Orianna and was going to craft her for myself but I accidentally disenchanted her into essence. I was wondering if there is anyway to return the essence and regain my champion shard. Any help would be awesome!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
We may be able to help out if you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Be sure to link them this boards post for tracking purposes.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hello, try and contact Player Support, they might help you:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
